mapper.insert: insert into t_acct_transaction_cat (trxcode, trxcat, trxname, showinpage, showinmer, trxdir, priority, nameforacct, merentry, iscalucost, isreal, issett, resend, issyscmn, isrev) values (#{trxcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxcat,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{trxname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showinpage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{showinmer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{trxdir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nameforacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merentry,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{iscalucost,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isreal,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{issett,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resend,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{issyscmn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isrev,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.select: select trxcode, trxcat, trxname, showinpage, showinmer, trxdir, priority, nameforacct, merentry, iscalucost, isreal, issett, resend, issyscmn, isrev from t_acct_transaction_cat where trxcode = #{trxcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
